alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Harrison, northeastern Hancock and east central Pearl River Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Saucier, or 15 miles north of Diamondhead, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Saucier, Lyman and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 28 and 41. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 14 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Pearl River; Southern Harrison
